column1: Smoque BBQ////I had the pulled pork platter
column2: which is basically a heaping pile of juicy
column3: tender meat which I topped with the super vinegar-y cole slaw. The acidity of the cool slaw really balanced out the smoky flavors of the meat. The platter also comes with two additional sides-- albeit small
column4: both the cornbread and peach cobbler pack a tasty punch.
